Metadata.name: Analog Control Fix
Metadata.author: Donk
Metadata.description:
Repackage of analog control fix patch for P3FES by AltimorTASDK so it can be easily included with Aemulus
"This makes turn speed dependent on how far you've pushed the analog stick. Normally the game only lets you turn once the stick passes a certain threshold at a fixed speed, I have no idea how anyone thought that was okay."
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lWl9m7SX4Eg https://gist.github.com/AltimorTASDK/01fa1725aeed7db62ec9
